title: Unauthorized immigrant population U.S. 1990 to 2017
summary: Overall Number of immigrants in millions has decreased over the Year.

Number of immigrants in millions is slightly increasing from 2005 to 2007, slightly decreasing from 2007 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2015, and finally slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2006 and 2007.
Maximum Number of immigrants in millions, about 12.2 was reported at Year 2007
The lowest Number of immigrants in millions, of value 10.5 was reported at Year 2017
